summary: 10 Books That Can Teach Race Powers.
descriptionHtml:
Power Of The Races

This Mod Adds 10 Books.
These Books Can Be Found In A Locked Chest In The Arch-Mage's Quarters.
If You Are The Arch-Mage, You Can Take Them, If You Are Not They Can Be Stolen.
This Chest Can Be Found Under The Great Eye.
The Chest Also Can Be Used As A Safe Storage, Because It Is Non Respawnable.

The Books Are Spellbooks And They Teach You The Following Powers:

Power Of The Argonian - Histskin

Power Of The Breton - Dragonskin

Power Of The Dark Elf - Ancestor's Wrath

Power Of The High Elf - Highborn

Power Of The Imperial - Voice Of The Emperor

Power Of The Khajiit - Night Eye

Power Of The Nord - Battle Cry

Power Of The Orc - Berserker Rage

Power Of The Redguard - Adrenaline Rush

Power Of The Wood Elf - Command Animal
author: JP0005
